channel.title: Best blank server base
channel.description:
Hi, im just wondering what your'e opinions are on best blank bases to use?
Needs to be stable and clean!

[/quote]

If anyone wants it, ask, I have a copy on my HDD and can upload it.[/quote]gimme

item.title: Best blank server base
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Vix, post:13, topic:534056”]Compiled a list while reading through the original and a more recent one at the same time…

  1. Makes no use of the attachment function of the Selector, instead creates a Map?

  2. Lack of documentation throughout the entire server.

  3. All of it’s update flags are stored as booleans.

  4. It’s PacketManager/Client class? Dear lord…

  5. Threads should be executed with the ScheduledExecutorService to avoid manually fixing them.

  6. Poor design flow on the entire entity system.

  7. Parses the cycle rate from the command line? Should be a fixed constant.

  8. It’s buffer allocations are way off.

  9. Nested both StreamBuffer implementations in the same class as the super, really weird.

  10. Misc class, self explainitory.

  11. No packet validation.

  12. Not user friendly stream implementation.

  13. Cheap haxed way for finishing a packet read.

  14. Handling packets is very dogdy.

  15. Inbound packet structure is garbage.

  16. Global state.

  17. Dodgy NIO implementation as a whole.

  18. Position’s data encapsulation sucks.

  19. WinterLove style updating.

  20. Horrific design, looks very thrown together.

  21. Player specific movement handler.

  22. Equipment slots…? (Look at Misc for info).

  23. HostGateway should be using an AtomicInteger to ensure thread safety.[/quote]
    the updating in runesource is done locally, while in a regular winterlove it is not, so #19 is wrong. also lots of points you’ve made are subjective

but i feel you, boy does the original runesource have a shitload of problems. fixing them is a waste of time, you’d be better off using a runesource derivative or hyperion/apollo/any other good #317 framework

Read full topic

item.title: Best blank server base
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Vix, post:13, topic:534056”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=652852.msg4375446#msg4375446 date=1381931388]

Don’t use RuneSource because it’s made from Blake’s man juice and it sucks. Use Hyperion or Apollo I guess. If you want something newb friendly, you can use Enzo’s Delta.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,646084.0.html

Could you give me an actual reason why RuneSource sucks? You said don’t use RuneSource yet you suggested delta?
[/quote]
list[/quote]
There you go. Although I’d consider half of those points to be because Blake threw it together and he tried mimicking wL. Such as the boolean update flags (pretty sure wL did that). I just hate went people repeat what others say without knowing a single thing of what they are saying. For example, Anval, as he suggested to use Delta over Rune-Source.

Read full topic

@strucker wrote:

Still, rune-source is good enough tbh, i find hyperion OVERLY complex
Thats my opinion though.

Read full topic

item.title: Best blank server base
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“Vix, post:13, topic:534056”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=652852.msg4375446#msg4375446 date=1381931388]

Don’t use RuneSource because it’s made from Blake’s man juice and it sucks. Use Hyperion or Apollo I guess. If you want something newb friendly, you can use Enzo’s Delta.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,646084.0.html

Could you give me an actual reason why RuneSource sucks? You said don’t use RuneSource yet you suggested delta?
[/quote]

Compiled a list while reading through the original and a more recent one at the same time…

  1. Makes no use of the attachment function of the Selector, instead creates a Map?

  2. Lack of documentation throughout the entire server.

  3. All of it’s update flags are stored as booleans.

  4. It’s PacketManager/Client class? Dear lord…

  5. Threads should be executed with the ScheduledExecutorService to avoid manually fixing them.

  6. Poor design flow on the entire entity system.

  7. Parses the cycle rate from the command line? Should be a fixed constant.

  8. It’s buffer allocations are way off.

  9. Nested both StreamBuffer implementations in the same class as the super, really weird.

  10. Misc class, self explainitory.

  11. No packet validation.

  12. Not user friendly stream implementation.

  13. Cheap haxed way for finishing a packet read.

  14. Handling packets is very dogdy.

  15. Inbound packet structure is garbage.

  16. Global state.

  17. Dodgy NIO implementation as a whole.

  18. Position’s data encapsulation sucks.

  19. WinterLove style updating.

  20. Horrific design, looks very thrown together.

  21. Player specific movement handler.

  22. Equipment slots…? (Look at Misc for info).

  23. HostGateway should be using an AtomicInteger to ensure thread safety.[/quote]cuz its supposed t o be like wl

Read full topic

item.title: Best blank server base
item.dc:creator: @Vix Vix
item.description:
@Vix wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:10, topic:534056”][quote author=Anval link=topic=652852.msg4375364#msg4375364 date=1381895423]
Don’t use RuneSource because it’s made from Blake’s man juice and it sucks. Use Hyperion or Apollo I guess. If you want something newb friendly, you can use Enzo’s Delta.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,646084.0.html
[/quote]
Could you give me an actual reason why RuneSource sucks? You said don’t use RuneSource yet you suggested delta?[/quote]

Compiled a list while reading through the original and a more recent one at the same time…

  1. Makes no use of the attachment function of the Selector, instead creates a Map?

  2. Lack of documentation throughout the entire server.

  3. All of it’s update flags are stored as booleans.

  4. It’s PacketManager/Client class? Dear lord…

  5. Threads should be executed with the ScheduledExecutorService to avoid manually fixing them.

  6. Poor design flow on the entire entity system.

  7. Parses the cycle rate from the command line? Should be a fixed constant.

  8. It’s buffer allocations are way off.

  9. Nested both StreamBuffer implementations in the same class as the super, really weird.

  10. Misc class, self explainitory.

  11. No packet validation.

  12. Not user friendly stream implementation.

  13. Cheap haxed way for finishing a packet read.

  14. Handling packets is very dogdy.

  15. Inbound packet structure is garbage.

  16. Global state.

  17. Dodgy NIO implementation as a whole.

  18. Position’s data encapsulation sucks.

  19. WinterLove style updating.

  20. Horrific design, looks very thrown together.

  21. Player specific movement handler.

  22. Equipment slots…? (Look at Misc for info).

  23. HostGateway should be using an AtomicInteger to ensure thread safety.

Read full topic

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,646084.0.html[/quote]facepalm Blake actually had a lot of good work, and most of the servers uses some of his stuff, even Apollo I think. Don’t do Delta, use something superior… rs377d is great,stable and good documentated, released by Blake.

Read full topic

item.description:

@King_JC wrote:

I reckon if you can or wish to work with a blank framework then you may as well just make your own, that way you will know it inside out and it will be want you want it to be.
